title: Will of the Ancients and Three talon strike
body:
Will Three talon strike proc will of the ancients all 3 hits, only 1 hit or not at all. 
It may be redundant to ask since its getting removed; just wanted to know.

replies.body: Three talon strike is an auto attack modifier, similar to Nasus q; it essentially works exactly like an auto attack but with the benefits of the ability. This means that lifesteal and on-hit effects will proc with the ability, but not spell vamp nor effects that proc on spell hit, like DFT or rylais
Thanks for the info, pretty sad it cant, but lets not cry over items getting removed anyway:)

If you want the same effect, I recommend buying gunblade; not only does it provide just as much AP, but it also gives attack damage, a slowing active, and the 15% damage leach works with every source of damage you deal (including on-hit effects from items and true damage).
